Text: I'm Guessing I'm The Only One That Has This Problem But The First Three Episodes Doesn't Have Sound. Is There Some Special Codec I Need. I Have AC3 Filter And K-Lite Codecs.
I only have mono-sound so, yeah, something's up with the sound and the video quality is...not good, but I'm not gonna whine about it since it's hard to find this show out here. Thanks for the up!
